side-dash.name: Side Dash
side-dash.result: This mech is pushed 3" in any direction.

shoulder-bash.name: Shoulder Bash
shoulder-bash.result: _Enemy and obstacle only_. The target takes **a hit** and is pushed 2" directly away.

stabilizers.name: Stabilizers
stabilizers.result: This mech gains **immobilized**. Until the end of the activation, this mech receives **+1** value to all its action flips.

vent-steam.name: Vent Steam
vent-steam.result: This mech discards **3 random overheat cards** and is considered to be **behind smoke** until the end of the round.

countermeasures.name: Countermeasures
countermeasures.result: All mechs within range remove the **marked** condition.

aa-barrage.name: AA Barrage
aa-barrage.result: Until the end of the round, if an enemy mech is **placed** within 6", it suffers **1 damage** on a random system.

repulse.name: Repulse
repulse.result: This mech is **pushed** 4" away from the target. The target is then **push** the target 4" away from this mech.

overheat.name: Overheat
overheat.result: This mech draws a card (discard and replace any jokers) and adds it to its **overheat pile**.

cold-exhaust.name: Cold Exhaust
cold-exhaust.desc: Discard one extra overheat card on reactor cooldown.

inertia-dischargers.name: Inertia Dischargers
inertia-dischargers.desc: When resolving an assault action (and its free action), this mech receives **+1 value** to all action flips.

hover.name: Hover
hover.desc: This mech ignore the **slow** terrain trait and can move across (but not stop on top of) other mechs. If this mech were to receive the **immobilized** condition, it will suffer **1 damage** on this system instead.

immobile.name: Immobile
immobile.desc: If this mech were to receive the **immobilized** condition, it will suffer **1 damage** on this system instead.

power-surge.name: Power Surge
power-surge.desc: When an action of this system causes at least one point of damage to an enemy mech, this mech may **draw a card**.

rekindle.name: Rekindle
rekindle.desc: When an action of this system causes an already burning target to gain burning again, immediately **resolve the burning condition effect**, reflipping any â™¥.

chain-shot.name: Chain shot
chain-shot.result: The target takes **a hit**. This action can be repeated without overcharging.

disruption-field.name: Disruption Field
disruption-field.desc: This model is always **obscured** from enemies targetting it from more than 5" away.

stable.name: Stable
stable.desc: If this mech were to receive the **knocked down** condition, it will suffer **1 damage** on this system instead.

jump.name: Jump
jump.result: Place this mech anywhere within range. This system suffers **1 damage**.

indirect.name: Indirect Fire
indirect.desc: Actions on this system may remove the **marked** condition from an enemy mech to ignore the LoS requirement.

launch-smoke.name: Launch Smoke
launch-smoke.result: This mech is considered to be **behind smoke** until the end of the round.

precise-strike.name: Precise Strike
precise-strike.result: _Overcharge 1_. Target takes **two hits** on the chosen system (except torso).

kick.name: Kick
kick.result: _Obstacle only_. Target is **pushed** 6" away from this mech.

overdrive.name: Overdrive
overdrive.result: _Overcharge 1_. This mech can move up to its **Speed+2** in any direction.

pull.name: Pull
pull.result: Push the target **6"** towards this mech.

heat-beam.name: Heat Beam
heat-beam.result: Target draws a card (discard and replace any jokers) and adds it to its **overheat pile**.

remote-override.name: Remote Override
remote-override.desc: This mech can not gain the **Jammed** condition.

supercomputer.name: Supercomputer
supercomputer.desc: _Once per round._ When this mech draws its reactor cards its owner can chose to discard the hand and draw it again

blow-up.name: Blow It Up
blow-up.result: Remove an artificial terrain within LoS and range.
